jobs_results.title: Blockchain Course Instructor
jobs_results.description:
Are you a blockchain, cryptocurrency, NFT, Metaverse, DeFI or Web 3 expert looking to share your knowledge and insights with others?

If so, Blockchain Institute of Technology (BIT) is seeking experienced instructors like you to create courses on emerging blockchain technologies...

As a blockchain course instructor at Blockchain Institute of Technology, you'll have the opportunity to shape and expand our learning resources while empowering discussions and encouraging further blockchain education and research.

Our expert technical team will provide the support needed to help you create amazing courses and engage learners with innovative learning resources such as engaging video lectures, course presentations, and demos.

As a BIT course instructor, you'll:
• Develop new courses on blockchain, cryptocurrency, and Web 3 with organized learning resources
• Stay up-to-date with new trends in blockchain and related technologies and incorporate them into your learning materials
• Participate in discussions about blockchain technology
• Collaborate with our technical team to optimize all aspects of your courses for a better learning experience
• Manage the content of your courses and update them regularly with new information

To be considered for this role, you must have:
• 3+ years of experience in blockchain, cryptocurrency, and Web 3 technologies with over 3 years of professional or industry expertise
• A passion for the field of blockchain, NFTs, DeFi, Metaverse, and Web 3
• A commitment to promoting blockchain education and research

About Blockchain Institute of Technology (BIT)

Blockchain Institute of Technology is the World Standard for Blockchain Education and Certification. ™

Our courses and certifications cover new grounds in blockchain and related technologies, and are designed to empower the blockchain workforce. Join our team and be a part of our mission to change the world... one blockchain at a time

job_highlights.title: Qualifications
items: 3+ years of experience in blockchain, cryptocurrency, and Web 3 technologies with over 3 years of professional or industry expertise
A passion for the field of blockchain, NFTs, DeFi, Metaverse, and Web 3
A commitment to promoting blockchain education and research

job_highlights.title: Responsibilities
items: Our expert technical team will provide the support needed to help you create amazing courses and engage learners with innovative learning resources such as engaging video lectures, course presentations, and demos
Develop new courses on blockchain, cryptocurrency, and Web 3 with organized learning resources
Stay up-to-date with new trends in blockchain and related technologies and incorporate them into your learning materials
Participate in discussions about blockchain technology
Collaborate with our technical team to optimize all aspects of your courses for a better learning experience
Manage the content of your courses and update them regularly with new information

jobs_results.title: Blockchain Developer - Contract to Hire
jobs_results.description:
We are looking for an experienced and highly skilled Blockchain Developer to join our MetaVerse project team. As a Blockchain Developer, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and implementing blockchain-based solutions for our virtual world platform. You will work closely with other developers, designers, and stakeholders to create cutting-edge solutions that leverage blockchain... technology to enhance the user experience, enable NFT transactions, and ensure the security and integrity of our MetaVerse.

Responsibilities:

-Design, develop, and implement blockchain-based solutions for our MetaVerse platform, including smart contracts, decentralized applications (dApps), and blockchain integration with other systems.

-Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product managers, designers, and other developers, to understand business requirements and translate them into blockchain-based solutions.

-Write efficient, scalable, and secure smart contracts using programming languages such as Solidity, Ethereum, and other blockchain technologies.

-Implement and optimize consensus algorithms, encryption, and security measures to ensure the integrity and confidentiality of blockchain transactions.

-Conduct thorough testing and debugging of blockchain applications to ensure their functionality, performance, and security.

-Stay updated on the latest trends, best practices, and emerging technologies in the blockchain and virtual world industry, and apply them to improve the MetaVerse platform.

-Collaborate with external partners, vendors, and other stakeholders to integrate blockchain-based functionalities into the MetaVerse ecosystem.

-Provide technical guidance and mentorship to other developers on blockchain technologies and best practices.

-Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues related to blockchain implementations, and provide timely solutions.

-Participate in code reviews, documentation, and other development processes to ensure code quality, maintainability, and compliance with coding standards.

Requirements:

-Proven experience as a Blockchain Developer, with a strong understanding of blockchain concepts, protocols, and technologies.

-Proficiency in programming languages such as Solidity, Ethereum, and other blockchain technologies.

-Experience with smart contract development and deployment on blockchain platforms like Ethereum.

-Strong knowledge of consensus algorithms, encryption, and security measures in blockchain.

-Familiarity with virtual worlds, NFTs, and gaming concepts.

-Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.

-Ability to work independently and in a team-oriented environment.

-Strong communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to effectively communicate complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.

-Experience with other blockchain platforms, such as Binance Smart Chain, Polkadot, or others, is a plus

jobs_results.title: Blockchain Engineer
jobs_results.description:
We are seeking a highly motivated and skilled Blockchain Engineer to join our team and help us design, develop, and implement blockchain-based solutions. As a Blockchain Engineer, you will be responsible for developing smart contracts, designing and implementing blockchain protocols, and collaborating with cross-functional teams. The project will be cutting edge and unique to the crypto industry... with exposure to the DeFi space. There will be massive opportunities to learn new technologies and skillsets, as well as the chance to develop, test, and maintain code for our mission-critical products.

Our culture is all about diversity, communication, collaboration and education.

Responsibilities and Scope:
• Design, develop and implement blockchain solutions and smart contracts.
• Writing and delivering quality code.
• Interpret product requirements and provide engineering estimates.
• Create and maintain documentation for all blockchain-related processes, procedures, and guidelines.
• Conduct code reviews and ensure code quality and security.
• Troubleshoot and debug blockchain-based applications and systems.
• Work with stakeholders to identify opportunities to leverage blockchain technology to improve business processes.
• Research and stay up-to-date with the latest trends, technologies, and best practices in blockchain technology.

What You Will Need To Be Great In This Role:
• Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or a related field
• A professional understanding of the Ethereum Virtual Machine and its Yellow Paper
• Fluency in Solidity, Typescript, and NodeJS
• Experience with web3 related libraries and API design
• A high level understanding of common cryptographic and smart contract related vulnerabilities
• Excellent problem-solving and debugging skills and/or experience with reverse engineering
• Proficiency with Git
• Must be passionate about working with a growing team in an office environment
• Great written communication skills
• Efficiency in Rust, a plus
• Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment and meet tight deadlines

Our Stack:
• EVM Blockchain networks
• Hardhat and Foundry
• AWS infrastructure

Preferred:
• Experience with decentralized finance (DeFi) protocols and applications.
• Contributions to open-source blockchain projects.
• Experience with Solana is a plus.

This role is based in New York City and will be expected to work from our New York office in a hybrid model Monday - Wednesday.

(NYC only) Pursuant to Section 8-102 of title 8 of the New York City administrative code, the base salary range for this role is $170,000.00 - $190,000.00. Total compensation packages are based on a wide array of factors unique to each candidate, including but not limited to skill set, years & depth of experience, certifications and specific office location. This may differ in other locations due to cost of labor considerations

jobs_results.title: Senior Principal, Product Manager (Technical, Blockchain/Digital...
jobs_results.description:
Senior Principal, Product Manager (Technical, blockchain/Digital Assets)

Bring your ideas. Make history...
BNY Mellon offers an exciting array of future-forward careers at the intersection of business, finance, and technology. We are one of the world's top asset management and banking firms that manages trillions of dollars in assets, custody and/or administration. Known as the “bank of banks” - 97% of the world’s top banks work with us as we lead and serve our customers into the new era of digital.

With over 238 years of rich history and industry firsts, BNY Mellon has been built upon our proven ability to evolve, lead, and drive new ideas at every turn. Today, we’re approximately 50,000 employees across 35 countries with a culture that empowers you to grow, take risks, experiment and be yourself. This is what #LifeAtBNYMellon is all about.

We’re seeking a future team member for the role of Senior Principal, Product Manager (Technical, blockchain/Digital Assets)

to join our Digital Assets team. This role is located in New York, NY HYBRID/REMOTE.

In this role, you’ll make an impact in the following ways:
• Provides solutions/recommendations for complex business initiatives for line of business, where analysis of situations requires an in-depth knowledge of organizational objectives
• Utilizes a comprehensive and in-depth knowledge of multiple areas across disciplines to achieve project objectives.
• Keeps abreast of contemporary concepts in business strategy and management and applies these to develop innovative solutions and transformation plans and roadmaps.
• Partners with business line managers to design short, medium and long-term operational improvements.

To be successful in this role, we’re seeking the following:
• Bachelors degree in business or a related discipline, or equivalent work experience required.
• Advanced degree preferred
• 10-12 years of related experience preferred.
• Experience in the securities or financial services industry preferred.

At BNY Mellon, our inclusive culture speaks for itself. Here’s a few of our awards:
• Fortune World’s Most Admired Companies & Top 20 for Diversity and Inclusion
• Bloomberg’s Gender Equality Index (GEI)
• Best Places to Work for Disability Inclusion, Disability: IN – 100% score
• 100 Best Workplaces for Innovators, Fast Company
• Human Rights Campaign Foundation, 100% score Corporate Equality Index
• CDP’s Climate Change ‘A List’

Our Benefits:

BNY Mellon offers highly competitive compensation, benefits, and wellbeing programs rooted in a strong culture of excellence and our pay-for-performance philosophy. We provide access to flexible global resources and tools for your life’s journey. Focus on your health, foster your personal resilience, and reach your financial goals as a valued member of our team, along with generous paid leaves that can support you and your family through moments that matter.

BNY Mellon is an Equal Employment Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. Minorities/Females/Individuals With Disabilities/Protected Veterans.

Our ambition is to build the best global team – one that is representative and inclusive of the diverse talent, clients and communities we work with and serve – and to empower our team to do their best work. We support wellbeing and a balanced life, and offer a range of family-friendly, inclusive employment policies and employee forums

items: Bachelors degree in business or a related discipline, or equivalent work experience required

jobs_results.title: Senior Blockchain Developer - Remote
jobs_results.description:
Description:

We're looking for a Senior Blockchain Developer to build smart contracts. You will work on core products like our domain registry, escrow contracts, and other on chain tools. You will work closely with our CTO and assist/advise leaders of our other product teams (ecommerce website and API team).

You Will:
• Code and launch smart contracts on smart contract platforms like Ethereum
• Build tools to interact with smart contracts
• Run unit and integration testing of smart contracts
• Work closely with other product teams to ensure that smart contracts function with other Unstoppable Domains tools

Requirements:
• Strong software development background
• Experience working with large codebases
• Experience working with open - source projects
• Proficiency with Javascript
• Strong knowledge of common algorithms and data structures
• Familiarity with basic cryptography
• Familiarity with P2P networks
• Strong knowledge of writing efficient and safe multithreaded code
•... Experience with Ethereum blockchain platform.
• Understanding of Smart Contracts

The Engineering Team:
• *Our Engineering teams consist of three major entities: Ecommerce, DevTools and Registry with 3 to 6 developers each. They are cross-functional, self-sufficient, and highly autonomous teams, working in direct cooperation with Product Managers, UX Designers, and Marketing Team. 90% of our team is currently made up of senior engineers.

We Offer:**
• Competitive compensation
• 15 days of vacation time, increased to 20 days after 1 year
• 7 health days to tend to health and wellness needs for themselves or dependents
• 80 hours of supplemental COVID-19 recovery time
• Health insurance coverage
• A home office stipend
• Flexible working hours
• 100% remote-work environment (if you choose)
• Growth opportunities
• Team building events and happy hours
• A robust knowledge base
• The opportunity to work with an incredible team spanning 20 countries
• A personalised blockchain domain

Unstoppable Domains focuses on Blockchain / Cryptocurrency. Their company has offices in San Francisco, Kyiv, and Remote. They have a mid-size team that's between 51-200 employees. To date, Unstoppable Domains has raised $136.9M of funding; their latest round was closed on July 2022 at a valuation of $1B.

You can view their website at https://unstoppabledomains.com/ or find them on Twitter and LinkedIn

jobs_results.title: Blockchain SecOps Engineer (US Remote)
jobs_results.description:
Axelar delivers secure cross-chain communication for Web3. Our infrastructure enables dApp users to interact with any asset or application, on any chain, with one click. Axelar is a blockchain that connects blockchains, enabling universal Web3 interoperability. The network is secured using proof-of-stake consensus, and messages are routed and translated using permissionless protocols. Axelar is... like Stripe for Web3.

Axelar has raised capital from top-tier investors, including Binance, Coinbase Ventures, Dragonfly Capital, and Polychain Capital. Partners include major proof-of-stake blockchains, such as Avalanche, Cosmos, Ethereum, Polkadot and Terra. Axelar’s co-founders are founding team members of Algorand and award-winning graduates of MIT, where they received notable recognition as part of their graduate studies.

Since the start of the year, the Axelar Network processed >$1.5B in cross-chain volume, connected 27 chains, and hundreds of developers are building around the stack.

As a DevOps protocols engineer, you will be a key contributor helping scale and operate the Axelar network.

What you will be doing
• You will be taking on responsibilities to operate the public network. This includes managing the deployments and upgrades of Axelar's smart contracts & core network, managing foundation delegations, driving governance of network and improving stability and reliability of in-house DApps.
• Building and expanding our monitoring capabilities to ensure our stack, as well as that of public validators, runs smoothly
• Evaluating and helping integrate new security focused protocols
• Strengthening our security posture and refining protocols for offline signing etc.
• Improving the infrastructure and deployment to improve team's agility and velocity
• Forging solid relationships within Axelar to fully understand the needs in the ecosystem whilst working in an agile environment

What you will need
• Experience deploying Smart Contracts
• Good understanding of cryptography
• Scripting / Go / Rush coding skills
• Experience managing a blockchain network, coordinating upgrades etc.
• Experience with containers and Kubernetes in a cloud environment
• Experience with monitoring and alerting tools (Grafana, Prometheus, etc.)
• Experience working with modern CI/CD tools

About you
• You have a strong sense of ownership, with the ability to lead and share knowledge to reach solutions as well as the keenness to learn
• Security oriented coding and deployment mindset
• You’re open to collaborating with internal and external stakeholders, flourishing in a distributed environment
• You enjoy being hands on, being a self starter that thrives well in ambiguity
• A problem solver at heart that can envision successful outcomes
• You have a creative flair, always seizing an opportunity to to do things differently
• Understand how to use blockchains / DeFi as a user

What’s in it for you
• Autonomous, distributed environment with the opportunity to work collaboratively in a diverse team across the world
• The scope to contribute to high impact work and really make a difference in a decentralized protocol
• Chance to really challenge yourself whilst learning heaps of stuff in the process
• Unlimited time off throughout the year to rest and recharge
• Competitive compensation with stock options, experiencing growth from the initial phase

jobs_results.title: Blockchain Security Lead
jobs_results.description:
About EigenLabs

EigenLabs is the team behind EigenLayer, which provides crypto economic security as a service for proof-of-stake (PoS) blockchain modules, such as rollups, bridges, oracles, and Dapps. In today's blockchain ecosystem, each service is typically secured by its own token. The difficulty of bootstrapping new tokens often leads to too little capital to secure their services... sufficiently. With EigenLayer, blockchain services can rely on Ethereum for security instead of the value of their own token values. Stakers in the Ethereum proof-of-stake network can "re-stake" their assets with EigenLayer to secure other services and earn higher returns. Customers pay transaction fees for these strong security guarantees, making it possible for anyone to build innovative blockchain modules without large upfront capital costs.

About the Role

We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Blockchain Security Lead to join our blockchain technology team. As the functional lead of security for EigenLayer, you will be responsible for developing and implementing robust security measures to protect our blockchain and smart contracts infrastructure against potential threats. You will be leading initiatives to ensure the integrity, confidentiality, and availability of our blockchain infrastructure.

This is a full-time position that is fully remote or located with the team based in Seattle.

In order to do this work effectively, you will need to:
• Develop and implement security policies, procedures, and standards to protect our smart contracts and blockchain infrastructure.
• Conduct internal security assessments, audits, and vulnerability testing to identify potential security risks and mitigate them.
• Collaborate with other teams to ensure the security of the entire EigenLayer ecosystem, including on-chain smart contracts, off-chain nodes, validation infrastructure and wallets.
• Develop and maintain incident response plans to handle security breaches and other security incidents.
• Contribute to internal and external tooling as part of our effort to make smart contract programming safer and more maintainable.
• Stay up-to-date with the latest security trends and developments in the blockchain industry, and continuously improve the security best practices.
• Engage with the community as a thought-leader for suggesting best-practices of security for various participants in the EigenLayer ecosystem.

About You
• Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Security, or a related field.
• 5+ years of experience in information security, with a focus on blockchain technology.
• 3+ years experience in software development using Golang, C++, Rust, etc.
• Experience leading large-scale security programs either within an organization or across one or more user communities
• Solid understanding of blockchain architecture, including consensus algorithms, smart contracts, and node management.
• Strong experience with cyber-security tools such as penetration testing, vulnerability scanning, and intrusion detection/prevention systems.
• Strong experience in Web3 security, including smart-contract audits, formal verification, validator node management, wallet security, and key management.
• Excellent written, and verbal communication skills.
• Ability to collaborate with cross-functional and geographically remote teams, partners, and community members.

Bonus Points
• Strong leadership skills with experience managing a team of security professionals.

You enjoy contributing in a team environment
• Proficient and thoughtful with asynchronous and synchronous communication, giving and receiving feedback, and working independently and with a team
• Proactively contribute to discussions about technical issues, sprint and roadmap planning, and improving team processes

You want to help the crypto ecosystem improve the everyday lives of billions
• Excited to learn and develop blockchain technology, even if you don’t have crypto development experience yet.
• Recognize the culture and community in crypto are different from other professional software industries, and you want to embrace and improve it

items: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Security, or a related field
5+ years of experience in information security, with a focus on blockchain technology
3+ years experience in software development using Golang, C++, Rust, etc
Experience leading large-scale security programs either within an organization or across one or more user communities
Solid understanding of blockchain architecture, including consensus algorithms, smart contracts, and node management

Proactively contribute to discussions about technical issues, sprint and roadmap planning, and improving team processes

Conduct internal security assessments, audits, and vulnerability testing to identify potential security risks and mitigate them

jobs_results.title: DeFi Blockchain Co-Founder
jobs_results.description:
Cryptops is currently looking for a Co-Founder / Chief Executive Officer to help launch a unique innovative DeFi exchange for crypto currency option derivatives using an on blockchain order book.

The Cryptops Exchange uses asset tokenization to provide an intuitive, secure and censorship resistant method for trading crypto currency option derivatives directly on blockchain. Cryptops is currently... the only decentralized exchange that uses asset tokenization to issue traditional financial derivatives directly to an on-blockchain order book.

Other decentralized derivatives exchanges require users to install web browser plugins in order to "connect" to a hybrid off-chain order book to place orders and make trades. This insecure method causes users to constantly lose millions in various "hacks", "exploits" and "vulnerabilities". These problems are solved using Cryptops where trades happen directly on the verifiable blockchain order book with transactions closing on average in under 5 seconds.

Some unique benefits of the Cryptops project.
• The most censorship resistant cryptocurrency derivatives DEX available.
• The most secure and convenient staking model that does not involve any kind of obscure lending practices or lockups.
• The asset token derivatives are exercisable to tokens that are pegged in value and directly transferable to real world native coins on their blockchains.

For further information, please visit the Cryptops website at: cryptops.exchange

Responsibilities

Raising capital, team building, and scaling the project.

Providing overall strategic direction and take part in decisions on how to best advance the project such as to list the COE coin to centralized exchanges.

Possessing strong understanding of the current DeFi market solutions and limitations.

Developing and executing a plan to ensure the launch and growth of the Cryptops project. This will include leading fundraising efforts and managing relationships with investors.

Qualifications

Can personally invest or immediately support an initial capital raise of $500,000 in return for a 10% ownership share of the Cryptops project.

Entrepreneur interested in introducing an innovative DeFi platform that uses a direct access blockchain order book.

Able to perform a seed funding of round of $300k to $3 million that will be used to get the project production ready and provide the proof of asset reserves that will be displayed by the public facing dashboard.

Deep network of investors, technologist and blockchain enthusiasts

jobs_results.title: Blockchain Analyst

job_highlights.title: Qualifications
items: Advanced proficiency in blockchain-based investigations, with a minimum of 2 years of relevant experience;
Nuanced understanding of blockchain technology;
In-depth knowledge of BSA/AML regulations;
Experience conducting complex investigations that involve multiple sources of data;
Advanced written and verbal communication skills;
Good time management skills;
Ability to work well under pressure and to manage multiple tasks simultaneously

job_highlights.title: Responsibilities
items: The Blockchain Analyst assists with various assignments supporting the Compliance Program of the Company
Conduct complex investigations into cases that are referred as part of the overall escalation process;
Conduct proactive blockchain-based investigations;
Produce briefs and reports on a range of issues:
Synthesize data derived from other sources into long-form analysis;
Provide training and support to other analysts on the U.S. Financial Crimes Team;
Maintain proficiency in all aspects of BSA/AML compliance;
Attend BSA training as assigned by the Compliance Officer
